description.value: This is a one-time snapshot of the allowed values for COVID-19 specific lab tests in EUDCC, retrieved in February 2023 from https://eur-lex.europa.eu/legal-content/EN/TXT/?uri=uriserv%3AOJ.L_.2021.230.01.0032.01.ENG. Contents may need to be updated and readers should consult the credential's documentation.
